author: pamarcelot
msg: Improved error reporting for the LDAP API connection wrapper by appending the generic result code description in the case where no message is returned by the server.

author: hwright
msg: Make "blame -g" more efficient when svn:mergeinfo is large.
Orders of magnitude faster on some large datasets where the server
is otherwise too slow to be useable.

author: jbellis
msg: validate cql TRUNCATE columnfamily before truncating
patch by Pavel Yaskevich and jbellis for CASSANDRA-2570
